thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: An old faithful.
thread.title_full: An old faithful. - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jodie H
title: An old faithful.
text:
I first stayed here 24 years ago. The Roosevelt is a timeless classic. There's a three piece ensemble that play most evenings in the foyer and the bar there are just as happy to serve coffee as they are cocktails. The rooms are spacious and unbelievably quiet. There's a huge old world walk in robe in the rooms. As far as location, it's perfect. Right by Grand Central station and an easy 5min walk to Times Square.
I'll stay here every time I visit NYC.
